orderpipe.label: OrderPipe.com
orderpipe.comment:
OrderPipe.com is a mobile sales dashboard for Magento, Amazon, and other shopping channels. This extension pings OrderPipe.com when you get a new order, so we can update your dashboard as soon as orders arrive, in real-time!

To use the extension, please first sign up for OrderPipe.com. Once you've signed up, please enter your store url and user from OrderPipe.com below (so we know who to match the pings up to).

If you have any questions or want help setting up OrderPipe on your Magento store, please contact us by email on contact@orderpipe.com or twitter at @orderpipe - we're standing by to assist!

url.label: Store Url
url.comment: This is the store url as it appears in OrderPipe.com

user.label: User
user.comment: This is the web service user that you provided to OrderPipe.com.
